Name: Maestro
Ingredients: 30 ml Giffard Fraise des Bois liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of balsamic covered strawberry.
Review: Strawberry and balsamic are a great combo - here served with orange juice, vodka and maple syrup.
History: Created by Salvatore Calabrese at Salvatore At Fifty, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Maestro contains 255 calories
